QuestData.Title: Arkhaan's Plan
QuestData.Description: Arkhaan remembers. He remembers something that will... yes... will save us.$b$bFollow Arkhaan. Isolon calls! We will offer soft words to the Light. The Light will banish the darkness.$b$b<Arkhaan eyes Alleria warily.>$b$bArkhaan will watch that one closely.
QuestData.RewardText: I should have seen this coming.
